open_ai_api_key__comments__: OPEN_AI_API_KEY IS REQUIRED TO USE DALL-E
chatgpt_auth__comments__: LOGIN AND PASSWORD FOR AUTHENTICATION ON OPENAI TO USE CHATGPT
chatgpt_auth_session_token__comments__: SESSION TOKEN INSTEAD OF LOGIN AND PASSWORD. COMES FROM COOKIES ON chat.openai.com AS "__Secure-next-auth.session-token"
chatgpt_auth_access_token__comments__: ACCESS TOKEN INSTEAD OF LOGIN AND PASSWORD. SEE: https://chat.openai.com/api/auth/session
chatgpt_auth_proxy__comments__: CUSTOM PROXY FOR AUTHENTICATION. SEE: https://github.com/acheong08/ChatGPT
queue_max__comments__: REQUESTS QUEUE FOR CHATGPT AND DALL-E (MESSAGES TO BOT QUEUE)
image_size__comments__: DALL-E GENERATED IMAGE SIZE (256x256 or 512x512 or 1024x1024)
